title: Architect's Philosophical Inquiry

panel_structure.description: The Architect manifested as abstract digital presence Geometric patterns and code fragments in background Minimalist setting suggesting digital/mental space Color palette: cool blues and grays with accent colors based on emotion

transformation_notes:
